content:
Weissblum family

1 Samuel WEISSBLUM/SZUER             1740 (Raphael) {census family 379}
 + Bluma                             1757-60 (Salomon)
  2x Aron WEISSBLUM                  1780-82 - 1832 #407
    + Malka KIRSCHBAUM               1785-87 - 1839 #111 (Szyia)
     3x Mordechai WEISSBLUM          Jan 17, 1798 Krakow
     3o daughter WEISSBLUM           May 18, 1801 Krakow
     3o Gittel Mariam WEISSBLUM      Dec 11, 1802 Krakow
       * Aron Jakob KESTENBERG       1801-02 - ?1846 #536
             married Mar 19, 1820 #12,  divorced Jun 16, 1825 #1
     3x Samuel Chaim WEISSBLUM       Jul 23, 1804 Krakow
     3o Chaie WEISSBLUM              Jan 3, 1806 Krakow
     3o Feigel WEISSBLUM             Nov 5, 1807 Krakow - ?Apr 27, 1879 #131
       * Pinkus Aron HEILPRON        Oct 26, 1808 Krakow - before 1870
             married Dec 26, 1826 #66
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Josua WEISSBLUM              Aug 30, 1809 Krakow
       + Perl LIKIER 
       + Liebe BRATT /WEXLER         1807-09 (widow of KORNGOLD)
             married 1833 #89

          + Sara LUX                 1847-48 Rawicz - 1916

        4x Tobias Jeremiasz WEISBLUM  Jun 14, 1840 #274 - 1842 #42

        4x son WEISSBLUM             1834 #57

        4x son WEISSBLUM (twin)      Jul 2, 1837 #328
        4x Szymon WEISSBLUM (twin)   Jul 2, 1837 #329
        4x son WEISSBLUM             Sep 25, 1838 #413
        4o Malka WEISSBLUM           Nov 18, 1839 #535
          * Samuel Mendel MANDELBAUM  1839 Trzebinia
           5x Rafal Tobiasz MANDELBAUM  Dec 16, 1861 (1862 #39)
             + Sura GITLER           Nov 13, 1854 Bendzin
                   married Feb 14, 1893 #86
              6x Pinkus MANDELBAUM   Mar 26, 1892 #196 - Jun 7, 1892 #272

           5x Dawid MANDELBAUM       Sep 2, 1863 #424 - Apr 17, 1931 Antwerp
             + Feigel TIMBERG        1856-57 Krakow (Abraham+ReizelGeli SPANLANG)
                   married Jun 30, 1904 #141
           5o Freidel MANDELBAUM     Oct 25, 1865 (1866 #30)
             * Izrael Lipa GREISMAN  Jan 1866 Ulanowa
                   married Aug 3, 1890 #89
           5o Elzbieta MANDELBAUM    1866 Krakow
           5o Sprince MANDELBAUM     Dec 30, 1866 (1867 #108)
             * Sender STOLZBERG      Feb 1870 Przemysl
                   married Sep 18, 1894 #158
           5x Aron Josef MANDELBAUM  Mar 16, 1868 #186
           5o Berta MANDELBAUM       1869 Krakow
           5x Schachne MANDELBAUM    Oct 13, 1871 #656
             + Ester REIFER          May 1879 Ridna ad. Trzebinia
                   married Oct 30, 1904 #196,  divorced 1905-10
              6x Iser MANDELBAUM     Oct 28, 1905 #761
             + Rachel ALFUS          Jun 15, 1881 #471

              6o Amalia MANDELBAUM   Jul 12, 1911 #468
           5o Sara Keile MANDELBAUM  1873 #110
           5x Simon MANDELBAUM       Mar 28, 1874 #207

           5x Chaim MANDELBAUM       Jan 10, 1882 #50
           5x Izrael Salomon MANDELBAUM  Apr 26, 1884 #241
           5x Akiwa MANDELBAUM       Jul 15, 1893 #440 - Aug 17, 1893 #433
        4x son WEISSBLUM             1841 #501 - 1841 #326
        4x Samuel Hirsz WEISSBLUM    1843 #505
        4x Moses WEISSBLUM           Nov 8, 1845 #568 - 1846 #423
  2x Abraham SCHAUER                 1783
    + Cierel Marya REIS              1780-86 - 1834 #240
